name: challenger
content:

someone who tries to win a competition, fight, or sports event from someone who has previously won it Synonyms
competitor
contender
rival

Add to word list
someone who tries to win a competition and achieve a position, esp. in politics or sports, against someone who has won it and now has that position: An aide to Buchanan said the conservative challenger for the presidency would hold a press conference tomorrow.
